titles.title: A bill to provide that the Employee Retirement Income Security Act of 1974 does not preempt certain State laws, and for other purposes.

bill.summary: 10/21/1993--Introduced. Amends the Employee Retirement Income Security Act of 1974 (ERISA) to provide that title I (Protection of Employee Benefit Rights) does not preempt any State law which provides for: (1) the payment of prevailing wages; (2) standards or other requirements relating to apprenticeship or other training programs; or (3) liens, bonding, or other security to collect delinquent contributions to a multiemployer plan.
